lyrics:
5 contributorslook at my truck lyricstheres a bible on the dash a little too good at collecting dust

that radio dial stays on 953 cause its the only one around here that plays country

if ya want to get to get to know me it aint that hard
its sitting on some goodyears there in the yard

youd never seen an 85 hit a hundred that fast
